summary: A collection of modules that automate the creation and preparation of all required input files for the Regional Ocean Modeling System (ROMS), including grid definition, bathymetry, masks, nesting, and various atmospheric and oceanic forcing datasets, with capabilities for regridding, interpolation, rotation, and NetCDF output.
business_intent: Enable oceanographers and modelers to efficiently set up ROMS simulations by streamlining data acquisition, preprocessing, and configuration tasks, thereby reducing manual effort and improving reproducibility of model runs.
